A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great visuals\, but extremely poor story\, disgusting insertion of politics\, slap-in-face rejection of plot setups from previous episode\, disrespect to Luke\, overload of merchandising\, weak energy (the pure energy between Rey and Fin was lost and not recreated)\, ignoring the laws of physics\, the movie was self-aware. Honestly\, episode 9 should explain that episode 8 was a nightmare that Fin had while unconscious.
